memberdef.argsstring: (sbfPoolCount, Tree, mTreeEntry, { int retval;retval=strcmp(lhs->mFunction, rhs->mFunction);if(retval !=0) return retval;if(lhs->mLine< rhs->mLine) return -1;if(lhs->mLine > rhs->mLine) return 1;if(lhs->mSize< rhs->mSize) return -1;if(lhs->mSize > rhs->mSize) return 1;return 0;})
memberdef.name: SBF_RB_TREE

param.type: { int retval;retval=strcmp(lhs->mFunction, rhs->mFunction);if(retval !=0) return retval;if(lhs->mLine< rhs->mLine) return -1;if(lhs->mLine > rhs->mLine) return 1;if(lhs->mSize< rhs->mSize) return -1;if(lhs->mSize > rhs->mSize) return 1;return 0;}
